channel.title: Posts on Not Just a Statistic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Not Just a Statistic

item.title: Poker! I Barely Know her!
item.description: If I Were a Betting Man… I recently listened to a story on the podcast for Moth Radio Hour. The speaker, Annie Duke, described how she came to be in a high stakes game of Texas Hold’em with nine of the other world’s best poker players. As a part of her story she mentioned that she first started playing poker when her brother, one of the other nine players at the high stakes game, on a small cocktail napkin gave her a small list of hands which she could play when she first started.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The Idea. Welcome to my first blog entry! I was going to do a quick introduction followed by an equally quick mini-analysis but then I started doing said analysis and it kept getting bigger and bigger as I thought of more things to add and explore… instead I am just writing this introduction and doing the fun stuff elsewhere. So, the quick rundown is this: I hope to use this blog to share my passion for data science by reaching two types of readers.
